mapper.update: update isolation_information set isolation_hospital = #{isolationHospital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isolation_home = #{isolationHome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isolation_start = #{isolationStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isolation_end = #{isolationEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where isolation_id = #{isolationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select isolation_id, isolation_hospital, isolation_home, isolation_start, isolation_end, report_id from isolation_information where isolation_id = #{isolationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select isolation_id, isolation_hospital, isolation_home, isolation_start, isolation_end, report_id from isolation_information
